ISSUE.TITLE: Facebook authentication plugin. Wrong image path for Linux
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.80 Unix systems are case sensitive

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix 7453 Update CatalogModelFactory.cs fixes #7453 currently loads parent category picture. Fixes reference so that child category picture is loaded instead of parent.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7458 Facebook authentication plugin. Fix image path (#7449)
